  <script type="text/javascript">
   if (window.location.hash &amp;&amp; window.location.hash == '#_=_') {
        window.location.hash = '';
    }
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "News";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>
 </head>
 <body>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.
   </div>

   <div id="subs-container">

     <div class="tr-corner">

    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="">
      <h1>
       In the News
      </h1>
      <h2>
       Muhlenberg Dining In the News
       <br />
       <span style="font-size: 10px; font-weight: normal;">
        October 17, 2016
       </span>
      </h2>
      <p>
      </p>
      <p>
       <span style="font-stretch: normal; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 252);">
        <span class="style10">
         <span class="style16">
          <em>
           Muhlenberg College values the dining services program as a critical part of creating a healthy body and facilitating the development of an inquisitive and healthy mind. As part of a successful and active student center, Muhlenberg Dining offers excellent and unique experiences through creative and cultural menu planning, expert food preparation, and innovative presentation.
          </em>
           
         </span>
        </span>
        <em>
         As an important part of Muhlenberg’s learning community, each of our dining environments incorporate transparent facilities and inviting upscale casual dining opportunities in support of learning and socialization. 
        </em>
        <em>
         Muhlenberg takes pride in providing a nutritionally balanced, appealing selection of food to meet varying needs, desires, and life styles of students, faculty, staff, and guests through unique and engaging experiences. 
        </em>
        <em>
         Dining Services at Muhlenberg College will provide an affordable dining experience and be financially self-sustaining.
        </em>
       </span>
       <br />
       <em style="font-stretch: normal; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 9pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 252);">
        <br />
       </em>
       <br />
       Muhlenberg Dining is commited to providing an exceptional dining experience on campus. Because of its dedication, Muhlenberg College has received national recognition from several media outlets for its food, programming and commitment to sustainability. Please click on the links below to read why Muhlenberg College is one of the best colleges for food in the nation!
      </p>
      <p>
       <br />
      </p>
      <p>
       <img title="2016 National Recognition" alt="2016 National Recognition" style="width: 750px; height: 952px;" src="/Images/Muhlenberg_Dining_Poster_2016_tcm1703-110512.jpg" />
       <br />
      </p>
      <p>
       <br />
      </p>
      <div>
       <strong style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <a href="http://www.princetonreview.com/college-rankings?rankings=best-campus-food" title="Princeton Review Ranking 2017">
         The Princeton Review: #16 Best Campus Food 2017
        </a>
       </strong>
      </div>
      <div>
        
      </div>
      <div>
       <strong style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <a href="http://www.thedailymeal.com/travel/80-best-colleges-food-america-2016">
         The Daily Meal: 75 Best Colleges for Food in America 2016
        </a>
       </strong>
      </div>
      <div>
        
      </div>
      <div>
       <strong style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <a href="http://www.princetonreview.com/college-rankings?rankings=best-campus-food" title="Princeton Review Ranking 2016">
         The Princeton Review: #17 Best Campus Food 2016 
        </a>
       </strong>
       <span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <br />
        <strong>
         <br />
        </strong>
       </span>
      </div>
      <div>
       <strong>
        <a href="http://www.thedailymeal.com/eat/75-best-colleges-food-america-2015" title="Daily Meal 2015">
         The Daily Meal: 75 Best Colleges for Food in America 2015
        </a>
       </strong>
       <br />
       <strong style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <br />
       </strong>
      </div>
      <div>
       <strong>
        <a href="https://www.cappex.com/hq/cappies/food-dining" target="_blank">
         The 2015 Cappies: Best College Food
        </a>
       </strong>
       <br />
       <strong style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <br />
       </strong>
      </div>
      <div>
       <strong style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <a href="http://http://www.huffingtonpost.com/thrillist/the-14-best-college-dinin_b_5798248.html" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
         The Huffington Post: The 14 Best College Dining Halls In America 
        </a>
       </strong>
       <br />
       <strong style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255);">
        <br />
       </strong>
      </div>
      <div>
       <strong>
        <a href="http://www.thedailymeal.com/75-best-colleges-food-america-2014" target="_blank">
         The Daily Meal: 75 Best Colleges for Food in America 2014
        </a>
       </strong>
      </div>

     tel. (484) 664-3488 |

      Contact Us
     </a>
